price: Na akyire yi nokorε sε, yεbεma wͻn nsuohyeε a adi afra (anom) agu so.
arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّ لَهُمۡ عَلَيۡهَا لَشَوۡبٗا مِّنۡ حَمِيمٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: thumma inna lahum ʿalayhā lashawban min ḥamīmin
